sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt Task {{60634edd-5276-46f9-9fd4-e1f1f1da98ab.item.number}} was auto closed because it's Due Date of {{60634edd-5276-46f9-9fd4-e1f1f1da98ab.item.due_date}} was older than autoCloseOverdue setting of {{071d8da5-8450-4d6d-9f49-29e46a0f321b.property_value}} days
